transitions.default: query.is_sleeping || variable.is_first_person || query.is_sprinting || query.is_sneaking || query.is_in_water || query.is_riding || query.is_gliding || query.item_is_charged || query.is_using_item || !variable.sword_all|| variable.t || !variable.shield_off || query.ground_speed || !query.is_on_ground
